text: Randal Edward Brecker (born November 27, 1945) is an American trumpeter, flugelhornist, and composer. In 1977 he founded the jazz club Seventh Avenue South. He won six Grammy Awards. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:American jazz musicians Category:American funk musicians Category:American R&B; musicians Category:American rock musicians Category:Musicians from Pennsylvania
title: Randy Brecker
